name: Cube Runner (itch) (PKerfant)
description:
Cube Runner is an endless, fast paced runner game where you play as a cube, and avoid obstacles. Try to reach the highest possible score !

Features:

  • An endlessly generated road, filled with obstacles that you have to avoid.
  • Choose from 4 distinct color themes to play !
  • Collecting coins can be risky, but is a good way to increase your score.

Controls :

  • D to move to the right
  • A to move to the left
  • Space to slow down (but you get less points !)

Credits:

  • Programming and assets by me
  • Sounds made with bfxr
  • Made with Unity

The game was first made in early 2021,  but uploaded on  itch.io in march of 2022. This is the first game that I feel is good enough to publish. The concept was inspired by a Brackeys tutorial, but the game was made without following said tutorial.
